titleStmt.title: Maria Edgeworth Letters Project Personography
titleStmt.author: Meredith Hale
titleStmt.sponsor: Wake Forest University, University of Tennessee, Xavier University, Texas A&M University

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY 4.0) Unported License

sourceDesc.p: Personal names and identifiers are derived from the Virtal International Authority File (VIAF) and the Library of Congress Name Authority File (LCNAF).

body.p: This is a personography that defines people associated with the Maria Edgeworth Letters project.

person.persName: Bedford, Georgiana Gordon Russell, Duchess of, 1781-1853
Brougham and Vaux, Henry Brougham, Barón, 1778-1868
Buchon, J. A. C. (Jean Alexandre C.), 1791-1846.
Byron, Anne Isabella Milbanke Byron, Baroness, 1792-1860

Charlotte, Queen, consort of George III, King of Great Britain, 1744-1818
de Belbauf, Louis Antoine Pierre Joseph Godart
Eroles, Ysidro Joseph Simon (Eroles y Eroles), b. 28 Oct 1809

Forbes, George, 6th Earl of Granard (Lord Granard), 1760-1837

Guerchy, Mademoiselle Marie Antoinette de Nangis de Régnier de 1748-1847

Haidar Ali, Nawab of Mysore, approximately 1722-1782

Irish young lady of the name of Sanderson
